title: Phantom of the Kill: Zero kara no Hangyaku
synopsis: Game producer Jun Imaizumi announced six new projects related to the smartphone game "Phantom of the Kill" during a Niconico live broadcast celebrating the game's one-year anniversary on Friday. One of the new projects is a 15-minute anime concept film.
voices: ['Yukana', 'Fujiwara, Tatsuya', 'Inoue, Marina', 'Asumi, Kana', 'Hanazawa, Kana', 'Nishimura, Tomomichi', 'Sawaki, Ikuya', 'Amamiya, Sora', 'Hirota, Kousei', 'Sasaki, Mutsumi']
staff: [['Shiotani, Naoyoshi', ['Director', ' Script', ' Storyboard']], ['Aoki, Yasuhiro', ['Storyboard', ' Character Design', ' Key Animation', ' Assistant Animation Director']], ['Dempagumi.inc', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Nishio, Tetsuya', ['Key Animation']]]
